What are you looking for? Advanced Search Home > All Categories > Family&Relationships > Singles&Dating > Resolved Question Jennifer Member since: 19 September 2006 Total points: 121 (Level 1) Add Contact Block
Resolved Question Show me another » Singles Scavenger Hunt (San Francisco)? I'm part of a singles group in San Francisco and helping to organize a Scavenger Hunt where teams will be organized with same number boys/girls in a particular age range. Hopefully, sparks in each team will fly but, if nothing else, it's a great way to meet new people.
It's probably pretty obvious but the goal is to send teams around San Francisco, with a digital camera and ziplock bag, to find"whatever"based on the clues -- meet up a few hours later and see who wins.
Anyone have some fun ideas that are borderline sexy/naughty (since it's a singles group) but not to raunchy since people don't know each other (fully) yet?
I have basic ideas like"Photo of girls sitting on boys lap while on a cable car"or"Get a flower from street vendor"or"receipt from a round of beers at XXX"….
but would love to hear some new ideas!… Please?! And, many thanks! 2 years ago Report Abuse by L.A.J. Member since: 23 October 2006 Total points: 38,286 (Level 7) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Asker photo of a team member getting a kiss from a complete stranger
photo of someone wearing a ___ ball cap (fill in the blank with the biggest rival to SF)
receipt for an adult video rental
photo of a team member talking on a pay phone
photo of at least team members playing in a ball pit or on other kiddie area of a fast food restaurant
photo of a waitress named"Mary"with her name tag showing
napkin, matchbook or menu for a specific, pricey restaurant in your area
photo of a man from the team wearing a ladies dress
a business card for a massage therapist
a photo of the entire team in a brand new sports car
a job application from a bowling alley
a photo of a team member carrying a stranger's groceries or packages to their car
a room key from ___ hotel
photo of a team member holding a snake
photo of a team member doing a handstand/headstand
photo of an arrivals/departures screen at the airport
photo of the entire team making a human pyramid
photo of someone wearing a shirt that says"I heart ___"
a souvenir from Alcatraz
photo of a team member carrying another team member piggyback inside Walmart
photo of at least 2 team members riding go-karts
Have fun! 2 years ago Report Abuse Asker's Rating: Asker's Comment: Thanks L.A.J.! Lot's of great ideas that got me thinking :) Action Bar: 0 stars - mark this as Interesting! Email Comment ( 0 ) Save Add to My Yahoo!7 Add to Del.icio.us RSS
